comments:
I was extracting a call into a local variable, inside a static class declared
inside another class.

If I first type in a variable name that already exists in the scope, I got the
warning, I clicked on anyways, I got the confirmation, I then clicked back. I
then chose a unique variable name, clicked ok, and got the error below.

I could start again, and refactor the local variable directly into the unique
variable name, and it worked fine.

Note that I'm compiling using 1.4.2, not 1.5.0 (session data shows 1.5.0, thats
just what launched eclipse)

Here are the details from the error log.
